text: Domenico Gualdi (born 30 April 1974) is an Italian former professional racing cyclist. He rode in three editions of the Giro d'Italia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Trentino Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Trentino
title: Domenico Gualdi
